typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		item_id as string,
		item_qty as string,
		unit_price as string,
		total_amount as string,
		date_of_sale as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> sales1
source(output(
		item_id as string,
		item_qty as string,
		unit_price as string,
		total_amount as string,
		date_of_sale as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> sales2
source(output(
		item_id as string,
		item_name as string,
		product_name as string,
		product_type as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> product
sales1, sales2 union(byName: true)~> AllSalesUnion
AllSalesUnion, product join(AllSalesUnion@item_id == product@item_id,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> ProductJoinedSales
ProductJoinedSales select(mapColumn(
		item_id = AllSalesUnion@item_id,
		item_qty,
		unit_price,
		total_amount,
		date_of_sale,
		item_id = product@item_id,
		item_name,
		product_name,
		product_type
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> DedupColumns
DedupColumns sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> JoinedTable
